amendment.description: To increase the number of organ donations by funding the programs authorized by the Organ Donation and Recovery Improvement Act of 2004.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4249 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4249 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S2064-2067; text: CR S2066) To increase the number of organ donations by funding the programs authorized by the Organ Donation and Recovery Improvement Act of 2004.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4249 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4249 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Dorgan.
